item.title: G7 1800 DD ModShop ETS2 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 19, 2025

G7 1800 DD ModShop ETS2 v1.0 ETS2

It sounds like you’re looking for the Marcopolo Paradiso G7 1800 DD bus mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) from ModShop!
ModShop is a well-known creator of high-quality bus mods for ETS2, and their G7 1800 DD is quite popular. It’s often a **paid mod**, meaning you purchase it directly from their website. This usually ensures better quality, regular updates, and dedicated support compared to free mods.
Here’s what you typically get with a ModShop G7 1800 DD mod and how to use it:

What to Expect from the ModShop G7 1800 DD ModShop mods are generally known for their attention to detail. For the G7 1800 DD, you can often expect:

High-Quality Model : Detailed exterior and interior modeling, often including animated doors, realistic textures, and a fully rendered driver’s cabin with an excellent driving position.
Realistic Physics: The mod usually comes with configured engine and transmission settings that aim to match the real-life specifications of the bus, providing a realistic driving experience.
Authentic Sounds: Many ModShop buses feature **real sound recordings** from the actual bus model, enhancing immersion.

Customization Options:
Chassis options : Commonly includes 6×2 and 8×2 chassis.
Engines and Transmissions : Various engine and gearbox options.
Customizable Digital Signs (Letreiros): Often allows you to type in custom destinations or messages.
Interior Customization : Different seat fabrics, and compatibility with SCS cabin accessory DLCs.
Skins : While the base mod might come with some skins, separate **skin packs** are often available, sometimes for free or as additional purchases, offering a wide range of real-world bus company liveries.
DRL System : Day Running Lights for added realism.
Compatibility : Designed to work with recent versions of ETS2 (currently confirmed for 1.54 and above for some versions of their G7 1800 DD, but always check the product page for the latest compatibility).

Installation :
Locate your Euro Truck Simulator 2 mod folder. This is usually found in `Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod`. If there isn’t a “mod” folder, create one.
Copy the downloaded `.scs` file (or files, as some mods come in multiple parts) into this “mod” folder.
Launch ETS2.
On the profile selection screen, click on Mod Manager.”
Find the ModShop G7 1800 DD mod in the list. It might have an icon or the name will be clearly visible.
Activate the mod by double-clicking it or using the arrow button to move it to the “Active Mods” column on the right.
Ensure the mod has a **high priority** if it’s a vehicle mod, especially if you have other mods. You can drag and drop to change priority.
Click Confirm Changes.
Load your game profile. You should then be able to find and purchase the bus at an in-game truck dealer (sometimes specific ones like Scania, depending on the mod’s base model) or a bus dealer if the mod adds one.

Credits: MODSHOP

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: World Map Background v2.1 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 19, 2025

World Map Background v2.1 ETS2

This background map mod is designed to provide complete Earth coverage while ensuring maximum compatibility with a wide range of popular map mods.

Features:
– Full world coverage
– Seamless integration with many major map mods

Compatible With:
– ProMods
– RusMap
– Project Russia
– Tasmania
– All Africa Map Mods
– Cuba Map
– Canada Map
– Brasil Map
and many others!

Ideal for use in complex map combos, this background ensures accurate positioning and alignment across the globe.

Credits: qxZap

item.title: Real Car Physics v2.0 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 19, 2025

Real Car Physics v2.0 ATS

Experience driving like never before with the Real Car Physics mod!
This enhancement brings cutting-edge, realistic vehicle dynamics to your game, transforming how cars handle, accelerate, brake, and respond to road conditions.
Inspired by real-world automotive engineering, this mod introduces features such as:

– Authentic Suspension Behavior – Feel the weight shifts during turns, bumps, and uneven terrain.
– True-to-Life Traction and Grip – Tires now behave according to road surface, speed, and weather conditions.
– Advanced Acceleration and Braking Dynamics – No more arcade-style speed bursts; cars respond to power and weight like real machines.
– Drifting and Skidding Realism – Precision control during high-speed maneuvers.
– Aerodynamic Influence – Downforce and drag now affect top speed and cornering.

Perfect for racing fans and simulation lovers, this mod makes every turn and straightaway feel genuinely thrilling. Whether you’re pushing a supercar to its limits or cruising through city streets, Real Car Physics delivers unmatched realism behind the wheel.
Works very well for trucks aswell so use it if you combine type of vehicles.
Place above all mods!

Credits: qxZap

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 19, 2025

Denver Outskirts Scrapyard (Colorado) v1.0 1.54 ATS

item.title: Realistic Weather System V1.2 1.55 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | June 19, 2025

Realistic Weather System V1.2 1.55 ATS

Realistic Weather System For ATS 1.55

Features:
Compatible To Work With ATS Game Version 1.55
10 custom Rain & Thunder intensity
Realistic Rain & Thunder intensity for summer weather patterns in United States
Realistic Rain & Thunder intensity for skybox configuration
Realistic Rain & Thunder intensity for ATS climate zones

Important: This mod works with Rain mods but MUST be placed above them as High Priority (In the top in mod manager)
WARNING: This mod is NOT compatible with Graphics mods
Recommended Rain Probability 15-20%

Credits: TheLion/Lionv8
